Activity: Log in and check emails. Begin researching load testing tools suitable for the game environment.
Select load testing tools to be used, such as JMeter or Locust, and create a testing plan.
Set up the load testing environment using selected tools and configure test scenarios to simulate user traffic.
Perform initial load tests, monitor server performance and response times to analyze behavior under various conditions.
Analyze the results of the load test; identify performance bottlenecks and potential improvements.
Prepare a report on testing results and proposed changes for discussion with the systems design team.
